# 📢 Welcome to the **Free Ads** section — where anyone can showcase their bot at no cost.


## 🧾 How It Works
This forum is open to **any member** who wants to promote their bot for free.  
Just create a post using the **template below** and tag it properly.

---

## 🧩 Posting Guidelines
1. **Use a clear title** (bot name or core function).
2. **Include a short description** highlighting what your bot does.
3. **List key features** in bullet points (what makes it special?).
4. **Attach a thumbnail** to make your post pop.  
   *(Ideal size: 1280x780 px)*
5. **Include your bot’s invite link**.

---

## 🏷️ Tag It Right
Select up to **5 tags** that describe your bot (e.g., Music, Moderation, Utility, etc.).

---

## 🚫 Rules
- NSFW, scam, and malware bots are strictly prohibited.
- No reposting the same bot over and over. One active listing per bot.
- Keep your posts respectful, honest, and clear.

Violators may be warned, muted, or banned depending on the case.

---

🎯 Want premium visibility instead?  
Check out the <#1287456180289147061> section to get featured in high-traffic promotions!
